title: "Our Team"

Our work on the **POPCORN-NCD Reporting Guideline** is led by an international collaborative group committed to transparency and rigour in simulation-modelling research.

### Principal Investigator

**Doug Manuel, MD MSc FRCPC**
Senior Scientist, The Ottawa Hospital
Professor, University of Ottawa

Dr. Manuel is a senior scientist at the Ottawa Hospital Research Institute and Professor in the Departments of Family Medicine and Epidemiology and Community Medicine at the University of Ottawa. His research focuses on population health modeling and health equity.

[{{< fa envelope >}} dmanuel@ohri.ca](mailto:dmanuel@ohri.ca) | [{{< fa brands orcid >}} ORCID](https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0599-2061)

## Strategic Advisory Group

Our Strategic Advisory Group (SAG) provides expert guidance on the development and implementation of POPCORN-NCD reporting guidelines. Members represent diverse geographical regions, methodological expertise, and stakeholder perspectives.
